   21: %%
   22: -module(mnesia_SUITE).
   23: -author('hakan@erix.ericsson.se').
   24: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   25:          init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   26:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   27:          suite/0, all/0, groups/0]).
   28: -export([app/1, appup/1, clean_up_suite/1, silly/0]).
   29: 
   30: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   31: -include("mnesia_test_lib.hrl").
   32: 
   33: init_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   34:     mnesia_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   35: 
   36: end_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   37:     mnesia_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   38: 
   39: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   40: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[{ts_install_cth,[{nodenames,2}]}]}].
   41: 
   42: 
   43: %% Verify that Mnesia really is a distributed real-time DBMS.
   44: %% This is the test suite of the Mnesia DBMS. The test suite
   45: %% covers many aspects of usage and is intended to be developed
   46: %% incrementally. The test suite is divided into a hierarchy of test
   47: %% suites where the leafs actually implements the test cases.
   48: %% The intention of each test case and sub test suite can be
   49: %% read in comments where they are implemented or in worst cases
   50: %% from their long mnemonic names. 
   51: %% 
   52: %% The most simple test case of them all is called 'silly'
   53: %% and is useful to run now and then, e.g. when some new fatal
   54: %% bug has been introduced. It may be run even if Mnesia is in
   55: %% such a bad shape that the test machinery cannot be used.
   56: %% NB! Invoke the function directly with mnesia_SUITE:silly()
   57: %% and do not involve the normal test machinery.
   58: 
   59: all() -> 
   60:     [app, appup, {group, light}, {group, medium}, {group, heavy},
   61:      clean_up_suite].
   62: 
   63: groups() -> 
   64:     %% The 'light' test suite runs a selected set of test suites and is
   65:     %% intended to be the smallest test suite that is meaningful
   66:     %% to run. It starts with an installation test (which in essence is the
   67:     %% 'silly' test case) and then it covers all functions in the API in
   68:     %% various depths. All configuration parameters and examples are also
   69:     %% covered.
   70:     [{light, [],
   71:       [{group, install}, {group, nice}, {group, evil},
   72:        {group, mnesia_frag_test, light}, {group, qlc}, {group, index_plugins},
   73:        {group, registry}, {group, config}, {group, examples}]},
   74:      {install, [], [{mnesia_install_test, all}]},
   75:      {nice, [], [{mnesia_nice_coverage_test, all}]},
   76:      {evil, [], [{mnesia_evil_coverage_test, all}]},
   77:      {qlc, [], [{mnesia_qlc_test, all}]},
   78:      {index_plugins, [], [{mnesia_index_plugin_test, all}]},
   79:      {registry, [], [{mnesia_registry_test, all}]},
   80:      {config, [], [{mnesia_config_test, all}]},
   81:      {examples, [], [{mnesia_examples_test, all}]},
   82:      %% The 'medium' test suite verfies the ACID (atomicity, consistency
   83:      %% isolation and durability) properties and various recovery scenarios
   84:      %% These tests may take quite while to run.
   85:      {medium, [],
   86:       [{group, install}, {group, atomicity},
   87:        {group, isolation}, {group, durability},
   88:        {group, recovery}, {group, consistency},
   89:        {group, majority},
   90:        {group, mnesia_frag_test, medium}]},
   91:      {atomicity, [], [{mnesia_atomicity_test, all}]},
   92:      {isolation, [], [{mnesia_isolation_test, all}]},
   93:      {durability, [], [{mnesia_durability_test, all}]},
   94:      {recovery, [], [{mnesia_recovery_test, all}]},
   95:      {consistency, [], [{mnesia_consistency_test, all}]},
   96:      {majority, [], [{mnesia_majority_test, all}]},
   97:      %% The 'heavy' test suite runs some resource consuming tests and
   98:      %% benchmarks
   99:      {heavy, [], [{group, measure}]},
  100:      {measure, [], [{mnesia_measure_test, all}]},
  101:      {benchmarks, [],
  102:       [{group, mnesia_measure_test, benchmarks}]},
  103:      %% This test suite is an extract of the grand Mnesia suite
  104:      %% it contains OTP R4B specific test cases
  105:      {otp_r4b, [],
  106:       [{mnesia_config_test, access_module},
  107:        {mnesia_config_test, dump_log_load_regulation},
  108:        {mnesia_config_test, ignore_fallback_at_startup},
  109:        {mnesia_config_test, max_wait_for_decision},
  110:        {mnesia_consistency_test, consistency_after_restore},
  111:        {mnesia_evil_backup, restore},
  112:        {mnesia_evil_coverage_test, offline_set_master_nodes},
  113:        {mnesia_evil_coverage_test, record_name},
  114:        {mnesia_evil_coverage_test, user_properties},
  115:        {mnesia_registry_test, all}, {group, otp_2363}]},
  116:      %% Index on disc only tables
  117:      {otp_2363, [],
  118:       [{mnesia_dirty_access_test,
  119: 	dirty_index_match_object_disc_only},
  120:        {mnesia_dirty_access_test, dirty_index_read_disc_only},
  121:        {mnesia_dirty_access_test,
  122: 	dirty_index_update_bag_disc_only},
  123:        {mnesia_dirty_access_test,
  124: 	dirty_index_update_set_disc_only},
  125:        {mnesia_evil_coverage_test,
  126: 	create_live_table_index_disc_only}]}].
  127: 
  128: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  129: 	Config.
  130: 
  131: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  132: 	Config.
  133: 
  134: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  135:     Config.
  136: 
  137: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  138:     Config.
  139: 
  140: 
  141: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  142: silly() ->
  143:     mnesia_install_test:silly().
  144:     
  145: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  146: 
  147: %% Test structure of the mnesia application resource file
  148: app(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  149:     ok = test_server:app_test(mnesia).
  150: 
  151: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  152: 
  153: %% Test that all required versions have appup directives
  154: appup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  155:     ok = test_server:appup_test(mnesia).
  156: 
  157: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  158: 
  159: clean_up_suite(doc) -> ["Not a test case only kills mnesia and nodes, that where" 
  160: 			"started during the tests"];
  161: clean_up_suite(suite) ->
  162:     [];
  163: clean_up_suite(Config) when is_list(Config)->
  164:     mnesia:kill(),
  165:     NodeNames = mnesia_test_lib:lookup_config(nodenames, Config),
  166:     Nodes = lists:delete(node(), NodeNames),
  167:     rpc:multicall(Nodes, erlang, halt, []),
  168:     ok.
  169: 
  170: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  171: 
  172: 
  173:     
  174: 
  175:
